list.name: Init
list.comment: Got the webapp to read the java config from the common package, flyway workss!

task.summary: some cleanup to get unit tests working
Got the webapp working, ie the spring context is loading now
got the spring mvc stuff wired in, it loads but the controller doesn't interecept yet
Added scan to find the controller, now the controller gets hit on a webrequest
config cleanup,, added context.xml with local db connection info
wired in commons, read the application-context.xml via the java-config. for some reason maven is not deploying the deps needed for commons into the webapp lib dir
got artifact definition configured to read in commons deps into webapp
